welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Boone, a charming mountain town known for its scenic beauty and outdoor adventures. We invite you to immerse yourself in our vibrant culture and explore all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Boone Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Boone Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ames Airport handles all commercial flights and is equipped with modern amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Ames Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a comfortable and efficient experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Perry Municipal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Perry Municipal Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport houses all check-in counters, baggage claim, and security checkpoints.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A offers gates for domestic flights and features a variety of restaurants and shops for travelers to enjoy.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B is dedicated to international flights and provides duty-free shopping and dining options.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
